title: Implement MediaAttachment thumbnail rendering
description: Implement thumbnail rendering with lazy loading, onError handler for broken media, loading skeleton while media loads. Support both image and video thumbnails. Apply proper CSS for sizing (150-200px), aspect ratio, and clickable hover effects.
dod: Renders img element for image attachments with loading='lazy'
Renders video element for video attachments with preload='metadata'
onError handler sets error state when media fails to load
Loading skeleton shown while isLoading is true (shimmer effect)
Aspect ratio maintained with aspect-video or aspect-square
Object-fit: cover applied to prevent distortion
Border and rounded corners (rounded-md border border-gray-300)
onClick handler triggers when thumbnail clicked
Error state: proper type checking for video vs image
